G

GeneticAlgorithm - Class in neuralnet
Genetic algorithm that adapt a network structure to solve a problem.
GeneticAlgorithm(int, int[]) - Constructor for class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
generate the first generation of the genetic algorithm.
GeneticAlgorithm(int, int[], float) - Constructor for class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
generate the first generation of the genetic algorithm.
GeneticAlgorithm(int, int, int[], int) - Constructor for class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
generate the first generation of the genetic algorithm.
GeneticAlgorithm(int, int, int[], int, float) - Constructor for class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
generate the first generation of the genetic algorithm.
getActFunction() - Method in class neuralnet.Perceptron
return the activation function used by the perceptron
getActivation(int) - Method in class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
 
getAdjustedFitness() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the average adjusted fitness of the whole population.
the adjusted fitness is the fitness divide by the amount of network in the network's species.
getBest() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return a copy of the best network in the actual population
getBestFitness() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the fitness of the best network in the actual population
i.e. max(GeneticAlgorithm.getFitnessArray())
getDerFunction() - Method in class neuralnet.Perceptron
return the derivative function used by the perceptron
getDerivative(int) - Method in class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
 
getDiversity() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the amount of species
getFitness() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the average fitness of the whole population
getFitness() - Method in class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
the fitness indicate how well the neuron is working used in genetic algorithm but can also be used to track the learning of the neural netowrk

higher value mean better result.
getFitnessArray() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the fitness of every network in the population in a float array[]
getGen() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
return the actual generation.
getHiddenLength(int) - Method in class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
return the number of neurons of the corresponding hidden layer
getImprovementLimit() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
the maximum number of generation a species can live without progressing if a species doesn't do any progress within this amount of generation.

getSpeciesTarget() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
the wanted amount of species is not always the amount of species that we get by generation but the threshold value is change every generation to get closer to that amount of species.
getSructure(int) - Method in class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork

getXp() - Method in class neuralnet.Perceptron
